about_the_game:
In this DLC you will find 40 wallpapers from the game. They are in the artbook folder which is child folder of the main folder game, including those pictures that were not included in the original version. Enjoy!
Nakedness.
All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years of age. Enjoy!

content_descriptors.notes:
Nakedness.
All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years of age.
Sometimes you will see girls without closes.

detailed_description:
In this DLC you will find 40 wallpapers from the game. They are in the artbook folder which is child folder of the main folder game, including those pictures that were not included in the original version. Enjoy!
Nakedness.
All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years of age. Enjoy!
name: Artbook Smiling Girls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: Intel Celeron
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 820M 2048MB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: In this DLC you will find 40 wallpapers from the game. They are in the artbook folder which is child folder of the main folder game, including those pictures that were not included in the original version. Enjoy!
